word:
But I would not now take any restitution money. I accepted the lowest royalty on my books, under a most solemn promise that they 


                      -10- 

would be pushed forward vigorously. This promise was not kept. There was fraud in the management. But I want no restitution; I want no increase of royalty for any books of mine sold in the past. God forbid, when the pressure is strong and means limited, that I should draw one penny from the resources for the carrying forward of the work.
